resources.string: Final Project
The test result indicates that you are very outgoing and sociable.You enjoy being with people, participating public gathering,and are always full of energy.

The test result indicates that you are more outgoing and sociable than most of people. You sometimes enjoy being with people, participating public gathering, and are full of energy for the most of time.
The test result indicates that you are somehow outgoing and sociable. Sometimes you enjoy being with others while sometimes prefer being alone.
The test result indicates that you are not outgoing and sociable for most of the time. You may feel more comfortable when working alone.

The test result indicates that you may be shy and afraid of express your own ideas and feelings. You may feel more comfortable when working alone and may be uncomfortable to socialize and cooperate with others.
The test result indicates that you are very temperate, kind, and warm-hearted. You often compromise when having conflict with others and are likely to sympathize others and offer help.
The test result indicates that you are temperate, kind, and warm-hearted to some extent. You sometimes compromise when having conflict with others and are likely to sympathize others and offer help.
The test result indicates that you are somehow kind and warm-hearted. You may sympathize others and compromise according to situational occasion and your emotion at that moment.
The test result indicates that you are somehow unlikely to accept others’ opinion or make compromise. Sometimes you may be aloof towards others and confident about your idea.
The test result indicates that you are unlikely to accept others’ opinion or make compromise. You may be aloof towards others and have the belief that you are always right.
The test result indicates that you have an unstable emotion. You can easily get angry, upset or depressed. If you try to control your emotion, you will have a mentally peaceful life.

The test result indicates that your emotion is somehow unstable. You may get angry, upset or depressed when facing problem in life. If you try to comfort and manage your negative feelings, you will have a mentally peaceful life.
The test result indicates that your emotion is sometimes stable but otherwise in some situations. Sometime you are able to manage your emotion well while sometimes are not.
The test result indicates that your emotion is stable. Though you may get depressed, angry, or upset because of some troubles in life, you can manage your emotion for most of the time.
The test result indicates that your emotion is very stable. You may have emotion fluctuation in life, but you have great capability to handle your emotion and make use of them.
The test result indicates that you are very imaginative, curious, and open-minded. You are usually willing to learn new skills, try new activities, and accept new ideas.
The test result indicates that you are relatively imaginative, curious, and open-minded. Sometimes you may be willing to learn new skills, try new activities, and accept new ideas.
The test result indicates that you are somehow imaginative, curious, and open-minded. Sometimes you may be willing to learn new skills, try new activities, and accept new ideas.
The test result indicates that you are somehow conservative. Sometimes you may not be willing to learn new skills, try new activities, or accept new ideas.

The test result indicates that you are not imaginative, curious, and open-minded. You are conservative in your life, unwilling to explore new environment or have new experience. Also, you may suffer from lacking of imagination and inspiration.
The test result indicates you are very conscientious, organized, and responsible. You like to follow orders and schedules, always know what to do.
The test result indicates you are relatively conscientious, organized, and responsible. You sometimes like to follow orders and schedules, often know what to do.
The test result indicates you are somehow conscientious, organized, and responsible. Sometimes you like to follow order and fixed schedule while sometimes prefer having free timetable.
The test result indicates you are not quite conscientious, a little bit disorganized. You do not like to follow orders and schedules, cherish freedom of time management.

The test result indicates you are not conscientious and disorganized. You do not like to follow orders and schedules, seldom know what to do. You’d better manage your schedule in order to achieve your goals.
